Heroes.Description: - {{HeroIcon|Pocket}} Pocket Enchanter’s Satchel visual effects updated
- Fixed a bug where {{HeroIcon|Pocket}} Pocket’s briefcase would stop animating when the duration upgrade was taken
- Fixed Ice Dome effects disappearing while still active if {{HeroIcon|Kelvin}} Kelvin dies during it
- Reduced chances that Leap gets stuck on geometry during the downward phase
- No longer has an innate +15% Spirit Resist
- Bullet Damage growth increased from 0.76 to 1.0
- Gun damage per bullet reduced from 6 to 5.6
- Shadow Explosion radius increased from 14m to 16m
- Shadow Explosion Fire Rate and Spirit buff duration increased from 15s to 20s
- Shadow Explosion T3 Spirit bonus increased from +10% to +15%
- Shadow Explosion T3 Fire Rate bonus increased from +5% to +10%

Items.Description: - Updated {{ItemIcon|Divine Barrier}} Divine Barrier sound effects
- {{ItemIcon|Fortitude}} Fortitude now starts on cooldown to prevent purchasing and selling in the field for significant regen
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Restorative Locket}} Restorative Locket Spirit Resist not working
- Melee damage bonus increased from 15% to 20%
- No longer has Spirit and Fire Rate bonus during the active
- Now passively always gives +7 Spirit and +7% Fire Rate
- No longer restores any Stamina on the target (previously fully restored it)
- No longer slows your hero for 3s
- Bullet Resist duration increased from 3s to 5s
- Resist per stack increased from 1% to 2%
- Spirit buff duration increased from 5s to 8s
- No longer passively provides +500 Bullet Shield
- When using the active, gain a temporary +500 Bullet Shield for 7 seconds
- Active {{ItemIcon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 40% to 60%
- {{ItemIcon|Spirit Lifesteal}} Spirit Lifesteal increased from +10% to +15%
- Headshot Resistance Reduction increased from 30% to 35%
- Channeling Spirit bonus increased from +40 to +50

Abilities.Description: - {{AbilityIcon|Pocket}} Pocket {{AbilityIcon|Affliction}} Affliction visual and sound effects reworked
- Updated {{AbilityIcon|Dynamo}} Dynamo VO for {{AbilityIcon|Quantum Entanglement}} Quantum Entanglement and a few other missing lines
- Simplify some visuals with {{AbilityIcon|Seven}} Seven’s {{AbilityIcon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud radius indicator to help clarify the bounds
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook cooldown reduced from 27s to 22s
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook T3 reduced from -15s to -12s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook Speed increased from 2700 to 3000
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook Return Speed increased from 1800 to 2200
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam DPS increased from 180 to 210
- {{AbilityIcon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot damage increased from 105 to 115
- {{AbilityIcon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows Multishot increased from 3 to 5
- {{AbilityIcon|Frost Grenade}} Frost Grenade cooldown reduced from 30s to 26s
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Afterburn}} Afterburn refreshing from item damage
- {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike now additionally damages enemies within 2m of {{AbilityIcon|Lash}} Lash on impact
- {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike radius reduced from 16m to 14m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike's ground preview now lines up under {{AbilityIcon|Lash}} Lash when cast on the ground
- {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike T3 reduced from +100% to +85%
- {{AbilityIcon|Death Slam}} Death Slam tether visuals now improved to communicate the different phases its in
- {{AbilityIcon|Malice}} Malice now comes out quicker and no longer slows you
- {{AbilityIcon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turret Spirit Resistance increased 50% to 60%
- {{AbilityIcon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turret Health increased from 30% to 40%
- {{AbilityIcon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turret T2 increased from +5m Range to +10m
- Fixed issues with {{AbilityIcon|Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage}} Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage not damaging units within the target area
- {{AbilityIcon|Scorn}} Scorn damage increased from 40 to 50
- {{AbilityIcon|Scorn}} Scorn T3 debuff duration increased from 10s to 16s
- {{AbilityIcon|Sand Blast}} Sand Blast duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
- {{AbilityIcon|Combo}} Combo T3 DPS increased from +30 to +40
- {{AbilityIcon|Time Wall}} Time Wall bullet freeze duration no longer increases with Spirit or {{AbilityIcon|Duration Extender}} Duration Extender
- {{AbilityIcon|Time Wall}} Time Wall bullet freeze base duration reduced from 1.5 to 1.25
- {{AbilityIcon|Time Wall}} Time Wall no longer deals damage to Mid Boss
- Max Damage Amp reduced from 150% to 125%
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T3 no longer provides +50% Min Damage Amp
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T3 reduced from +125% Max Damage to +75%
- {{AbilityIcon|Affliction}} Affliction DPS reduced from 30 to 26
- {{AbilityIcon|Power Surge}} Power Surge rebalanced around no longer reducing fire rate (similar shock value effectiveness as before)
- {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask damage increased from 48 to 55
- {{AbilityIcon|Crimson Slash}} Crimson Slash cooldown reduced from 13s to 11s
- {{AbilityIcon|Power Slash}} Power Slash physics/world collision reduced from 15 to 4 (allowing it to be more easily used near objects)

General.Description: - Sandbox mode now supports entering it with your party
- Sandbox mode now has troopers spawning on the left side
- Added Search By Match ID to the Watch Tab
- Added Filter By Hero to the Watch Tab
- You can now see an indicator for enemy troopers when near them if they are behind a wall or offscreen (primarly improves tracking their positions during the lane)
- Map is now precached while in the queue to improve loading times into matches
- Visual and Audio updates to the shop
- Added a key for toggling replays being paused (defaults to P)
- Hero death voices are now broadcast more widely
- Fixed being unable to ping while casting or channeling
- Fixed various issues with hero abilities causing you to be stuck in walls
- Fixed players being able to kill themselves pre-match and run around in the map
- Fixed Stamina not appearing to regenerate while spectating
- Improve the text display when a replay is still processing after a match
- Fixed Walker boss moving around while the game is paused
- Fixed visual bug on Spirit Urn when dropping on the ground
- Fixed items not updating in the UI when purchased from the shop while spectating a teammate

Item Gameplay.Description: - Quicksilver: Now passively has a +10% reload time penalty

Misc Gameplay.Description: - Sprint is now always considered active as long as you are out of combat (haven’t taken or dealt damage for 5s, healthbar is now a little transparent when out of combat).
- Fixed various inconsistencies and scenarios with how Sprint speed was calculated. Previously there were many conditions that could result in you losing the bonus.
- Patron (Weakened) now has 40hp/s regen when it has not taken damage for 30s
- Medic Troopers no longer use their heal on troopers if there is a hero within 30m
- Zipline Speed Boost cooldown reduced from 420s to 380s
- Damage over time no longer prevents zipline usage

- Adjusted how the Anti Backdoor system works. It does a little less % damage reduction now, but it regens “backdoor damage” dealt to it over time. Backdoor damage is defined as any damage taken with no candle troopers within 50m in the last 20 seconds.
- Troopers run speed increased from 9.1 m/s to 10 m/s
- Troopers DPS vs Patrons reduced from 110 DPS to 80 DPS
- Troopers DPS vs Walkers from 110 DPS to 80 DPS
- Troopers DPS vs Base Guardians from 110 DPS to 80 DPS
- Crate Powerups: Removed Zipline buff as a potential drop
- Crate Powerups: Increased Health Regen drop from 1.25% Regen to 1.5%
- Crate Powerups: Added Fire Rate drop, provides +20% Fire Rate for 25s
- Vault base bounty increased from 200 to 225
- Fixed some issues that allowed players to more easily camp players in the spawn area

Note: 10% of users will default to vulkan rendersystem. If you experience any issues related to this, you can report these on the forums and switch to dx11 in the video settings. Deadlock will eventually drop support for dx11 and render on vulkan exclusively.
